pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Accessing the database using JDatabase" - Joomla! Documentation
textBeforeTable: To make a connector available in Joomla's installer or global configuration manager, you will need to ensure the PHP library is installed (E.g. for PHP5 and MySQL the php5-mysql library would need to be installed). The table below outlines the database and storage connectors available for Joomla! as well as which version of Joomla they became available in. Supported Storage Connectors Extension:DynamicPageList (DPL), version 2.3.0 : Warning: No results. textAfterTable: PHP Data Objects is a database abstraction layer and is shipped with PHP 5.1+.
